Posts.Content: Gregory P. Thank you very much for the information that you have give me. I will looking into the chemosensitivity testing.
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy in Metastatic Breast Cancer: Historical Accomplishment

Posts.Content: Gregory P. I have metastic breast cancer. I am stage IV ,I found out in July 2002 I have tumors in my spine and other parts of my body. The breast turmor is in my left armpit. The doctors say they can not remove it. I have had chemotherapy since 2002. I have all the radition treatment that the doctors can give me. I need to know if there is anyone who has the same metastic breast cancer that I have and what are the doctors are doing for them. I feel I am alone with this disease.
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy in Metastatic Breast Cancer: Historical Accomplishment
